game.name: Umbra Lumen
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 코멘터리 제공, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Roguelike Deckbuilder meets puzzle gameplay. Collect tarot cards and mystic items as you face unpredictable events, meet memorable characters, and explore the beyond life. Each run is different, and every decision matters. Will you ascend or fall in this unique turn-based RPG?
